add_data_models.name: noaa_isd
add_data_models.description: NOAA integrated surface database - weather data

weatherStationMeasures.name: elevation
weatherStationMeasures.description: The elevation of a GEOPHYSICAL-POINT-OBSERVATION relative to Mean Sea Level (MSL).

weatherStationMeasures.name: windAngle
weatherStationMeasures.description: The angle, measured in a clockwise direction, between true north and the direction from which the wind is blowing. MIN: 001 MAX: 360 UNITS: Angular Degrees

weatherStationMeasures.name: temperature
weatherStationMeasures.description: The temperature of the air. MIN: -0932 MAX: +0618 UNITS: Degrees Celsius

weatherStationMeasures.name: seaLvlPressure
weatherStationMeasures.description: The air pressure relative to Mean Sea Level (MSL). MIN: 08600 MAX: 10900 UNITS: Hectopascals

weatherStationMeasures.name: precipTime
weatherStationMeasures.description: The quantity of time over which the LIQUID-PRECIPITATION was measured. Units: Hours. MIN: 00; MAX: 98; 99 = Missing.

weatherStationMeasures.name: precipDepth
weatherStationMeasures.description: The depth of LIQUID-PRECIPITATION that is measured at the time of an observation. Units: millimeters. MIN: 0000; MAX: 9998; 9999 = Missing.

weatherStationMeasures.name: snowDepth
weatherStationMeasures.description: The depth of snow and ice on the ground. MIN: 0000 MAX: 1200 UNITS: centimeters

add_job_types.name: get_weather_data
add_job_types.description: Get weather data (NOAA ISD) - Azure open datasets

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude for the point for which we want to fetch weather data

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude for the point for which we want to fetch weather data

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: Date from which (inclusive) weather data will be downloaded for the farm. Format is YYYY-MM-DD. Example: 2019-09-28

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description: Date to which (inclusive) weather data will be downloaded for the farm. Format is YYYY-MM-DD. Example: 2019-09-28

parameters.name: farm_id
parameters.description: System generated unique Farm Id. Please refer to Farm APIs for more information.
